criteria: >80% unit test coverage on new code; All E2E tests for registration passing.
success_metrics: Zero critical bugs in the registration flow; All acceptance criteria for US-ID-001 met.

criteria: Security review of token generation, validation, and session invalidation logic passed; No high-severity vulnerabilities found in automated scans for new code.
bypass_criteria: All findings must be addressed or have a documented mitigation plan.
success_metrics: No exploitable vulnerabilities in the authentication or recovery flows.

criteria: All CI/CD stages (build, test, scan, deploy) passing; Successful automated deployment to the staging EKS cluster.
bypass_criteria: Documented manual override for emergency hotfix.
success_metrics: Continuous deployment to staging is reliable and repeatable.
